title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park             News   Browse press releases, subscribe to updates and dig into archived news.            History and Culture   Learn more about the historic landscapes, structures, objects and archaeological resources at Valley Forge.         Nature   Valley Forge provides a variety of habitat types for over 315 animal and 730 plant species.               Education   Bring Valley Forge to the classroom or the classroom to Valley Forge.         Kids and Youth   Learn how to become a junior ranger; look for youth events and activities, and find out about scouting programs available at the park.        The Encampment Store   Bookstore employees holding up Find Your Park merchandise.         Â    Looking to learn more?   News Browse press releases, subscribe to updates and dig into archived news.   Photos and more Experience the park from afar! Check out our photo galleries, videos and more.    History & Culture Learn more about the historic landscapes, structures, objects and archaeological resources at Valley Forge.    Nature Valley Forge provides a variety of habitat types for over 315 animal and 730 plant species.     Education Bring Valley Forge to the classroom or the classroom to Valley Forge. Browse lesson plans, homeschool day events, field trip information, and professional development opportunities.    Meet your park Have you ever wondered how the National Park Services manages a park, day-to-day? Learn how your tax dollars are spent, long-range park planning and improvements, get links to detailed policies and regulations, and more.   Kids & Youth Learn how to become a junior ranger; look for youth events and activities, and find out about scouting programs available at the park.   Bookstore The Encampment Store is the non-profit partner of Valley Forge National Historical Park. A percentage of all purchases, in-store and online, go back to Valley Forge. The store also offers a number of guided tours including trolley tours, bike tours, and private step-on tours.
